基金以往之績效，不代表未來投資之表現，投資人應慎選投資標的。: The past performance of funds does not guarantee their return. Investors should carefully select the investment targets before making any investment decisions.

基金投資非屬存款保險承保範圍: Investment in Funds is not covered by deposit insurance.

嚴禁採折花木，於樹木、岩石及標示牌加刻文字或圖形: Any form of vandalism, including graffiti and taking flowers or plants, is strictly prohibited.

請勿在遊戲場攀爬設施物，座椅及欄杆等，以免發生危險。: No climbing on equipment, seats or railings in play area.

本遊戲場設施限12歲以下剩童使用，3歲以下或狀況特殊之兒童需要成人陪同使用: This play area is for children 12 or under.  Children 3 or under or with special needs must be accompanied by adults.

電梯運轉中，突遇火災、水災、地震請按最近樓層或停止樓層，迅速離開(預知停電、火災: In the event of fire, flood or earthquake, stop on the nearest floor and exit the elevator immediately. (Do not use the elevator in case of power failure, fire or earthquake.)

請勿嘗試打開電梯內外門，以防止墜落或意外發生: Please do not try to force elevator doors open.

電梯內非密閉空間，空氣是流通的請勿慌張，靜待救援: Please stay calm and wait for assistance. This elevator is ventilated.

被困於電梯時，請按對講機或利用通訊設備與管理員或保養公司聯絡: If you are trapped in this elevator, use the intercom or other communication device to call for help.

若遇緊急事件請用緊急電話與中控室連絡: In case of emergency, please use this telephone to contact Central Control Room.

老弱婦孺及行動不便及攜帶大件或多件行李旅客請搭後方電梯: Passengers who are elderly, disabled, travelling with children or excess baggage, please use elevator (at the back).
